modName: Heavy Armory - Ars Metallica Meltdown Recipes
summary: Adds meltdown recipes to PrivateEye\'s Heavy Armory weapons for use with Arthmoors Ars Metallica.
descriptionHtml:
Adds meltdown recipes to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21120/?]PrivateEye\'s Heavy Armory[/url] weapons for use with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16084/?]Arthmoor\'s Ars Metallica.[/url]

Requires [b]Heavy Armory - New Weapons.[/b] Does not require Ars Metallica, or contain assets from it, but is tuned to match its meltdown formula. I highly recommend you use this in conjunction with Ars Metallica, as it already contains meltdown recipes for vanilla weapons and armors, as well as many other smithing enhancements. A must have.


Currently included recipes: Iron, Steel, Imperial, Elven, Dwarven, Glass, Orcish and Ebony. 
Dragonborn: Stalhrim and Nordic
Dawnguard Steel weaponry coming soon.

Load order: Place below PrvtI_HeavyArmory.esp
Coming soon: Dawnguard module.

If you like this mod and choose to endorse it, please give your endorsements to Heavy Armory and Ars Metallica as well.
author: Branthos
